message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I'm very interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1350000. Is that more to your liking?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1250000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I can see you're serious about this product. I'm willing to come down to $1300000, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $1300000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1275000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
